div.p: The kind of relationship between two XDS documents
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/xds-relationship-type

tr.td: A separate XDS Document that references a prior document, and may extend or alter the observations in the prior document.
A new version of an existing document.
A transformed document is derived by a machine translation from some other format.
Both a XFRM and a RPLC relationship.
This document signs the target document.

description.value: The kind of relationship between two XDS documents

definition.value: A separate XDS Document that references a prior document, and may extend or alter the observations in the prior document.

A transformed document is derived by a machine translation from some other format.
Both a XFRM and a RPLC relationship.
